welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saint-Ouen, a charming city known for its vibrant markets and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all the beauty and culture our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it requires registration and has a time limit of 4 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and bandwidth.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
